parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: Pointer to the CPropertyPage to add, cast to a long

title: ISWPropertySheet.AddPage
description: Adds a CPropertyPage-derived page to an ISWPropertySheet.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: Pointer to the CPropertyPage to add, cast to a long

returns: True if successful, false if not
remarks:
If your application must be x64 compatible, then use
ISWPropertySheet::AddPagex64
.
